definition: to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: During my stay in bed, some of them came to see me and helped me with my lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我住院期间，一些同学来探望我，并帮我补习功课。

sentences.english: I go to cram schools to supplement my regular education.
sentences.chinese: 除了一般的教育之外，我还上补习班作为辅助。

sentences.english: The Education Department said coaching was 'a private matter for parents'.
sentences.chinese: 州教育部说补习是家长们私人的事务。

sentences.english: "We don't have good prep schools in Cheonan, " said his mother, Eun-Joo Kim.
sentences.chinese: “在车南没有好的补习学校，”他的妈妈金恩珠说。

sentences.english: When I was in college, I spent some of my spare time working as a math tutor for people in the lower-level mathematics classes.
sentences.chinese: 在大学时，我利用课余时间为数学较差的学生补习。

sentences.english: Weekends are spent sharpening academic weak spots in paid tutoring sessions.
sentences.chinese: 周末得花钱上补习班，提高自己学习中的薄弱环节。

sentences.english: Many jukus offer high salaries to recruit experienced teachers.
sentences.chinese: 许多课外补习学校高薪招聘有经验的教师。

sentences.english: What documents I need to bring for the first tutoring appointment?
sentences.chinese: 第一次上堂补习或见面时，需要带备什么证明文件？

sentences.english: He's been having remedial lessons and is now starting to read.
sentences.chinese: 他一直都在上补习班，现在已经开始阅读。

sentences.english: Senior high school students often take after-class remediation in order to deal with college entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 高中生常常报名课外英语补习以应对高考。

sentences.english: I have been head instructor of Mathematics and Sciences for an education institute.
sentences.chinese: 曾于补习社担任主任数理科导师。

sentences.english: This is a requested tutorial for Marcelo.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个要求补习的马塞洛。

sentences.english: There were no differences between educational expectation of parents and after-school learning.
sentences.chinese: 父母教育期望对儿童才艺补习并无显著影响。

sentences.english: The continuation class has already fulfilled its enrolment quota.
This research aims to explore the training effectiveness of air cram schools.
sentences.chinese: 本研究系针对航空补习班训練成效进行研究。

sentences.english: Even if the cram schools are successful, there are still problems.
sentences.chinese: 即使这些补习班的事业斐然，仍然存在著一些问题。

definition: to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
to teach as substitute for absent teacher
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
to give classes/to work as a teacher
